name: Escape From Phobos
description:
Escape From Phobos is my very first big  solo project I made while I was at university. It dates back to early 2020, but I never publicly made it available until now.

This is a slightly improved version of what I submitted back in the day. While the puzzles did not change, I fixed minor bugs.

I do not consider this little game completed yet, and I still have some designs for a couple new puzzles and rework for the ones already implemented. I am now more proficient than when I first made this project and hopefully in the future I will have time to give this game a well deserved overhaul!
